# Source: https://docs.vllm.ai/en/stable/benchmarking/

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://github.com/vllm-project/vllm/edit/main/docs/benchmarking/README.md "Edit this page")

# Benchmark Suites[Â¶](#benchmark-suites "Permanent link")

vLLM provides comprehensive benchmarking tools for performance testing and evaluation:

-   **[Benchmark CLI](cli/)**: `vllm bench` CLI tools and specialized benchmark scripts for interactive performance testing.
-   **[Parameter Sweeps](sweeps/)**: Automate `vllm bench` runs for multiple configurations, useful for [optimization and tuning](../configuration/optimization/).
-   **[Performance Dashboard](dashboard/)**: Automated CI that publishes benchmarks on each commit.
